experience.title: Student Placement Coordinator
experience.description: • 1 of the 13 students selected by a panel of Deans and Professors to conduct placements and career development activities of 3000+ students of IIT Kharagpur• Achieved outstanding numbers - 1300+ Full-time offers (Highest among all IITs), 600+ Internship offers (highest in the history of IIT Kgp) in the year 2020 - right in the peak of covid 19 economic effects.• Increased hiring numbers by 30% by spearheading multiple crucial negotiations with executives of top organizations.• Economic times link:

experience.title: Captain - Inter IIT Men's Basketball Team
experience.description: • Won medals and Individual awards for excellent performance across all three major categories of tournaments - Nationals, Inter IIT, and Inter Hall• Gold - Basketball Men's - Inter IIT 2017-18; Silver - Basketball Men's - Inter IIT 2019-20• Silver: Udghosh 2018-19 (Annual sports fest of IIT Kanpur) - Total 36 teams participated from all across the country• Silver - Inter Hall General Championship 2017-18; Awarded the Best Freshor trophy for outstanding performances• IIT Kharagpur won Gold, lifting the Inter IIT Sports General Championship 2019-20 after 18 long years
